answerText: Xist [or X inactive specific transcript][10] Another long non-coding RNA is COOLAIR, which causes histone modifications that decrease expression of Flowering Locus C. The result is this process, in which flowering plants need to be exposed to the cold for a while to be able to flower when it gets warm.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Columbia A - WKU A | 18 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some things about long noncoding RNA. For 10 points each: [10] This first long non-coding RNA to be discovered causes lyonization by wrapping around the X chromosome to be inactivated.
